headline: Stanley Black & Decker To Present At The Wolfe Research 18th Annual Global Transportation & Industrials Conference
summary: Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE: SWK) invites investors and the general public to listen to a webcast of a presentation by Chris Nelson, COO, Executive Vice President and President, Tools & Outdoor, at the Wolfe Research 18th Annual Global Transportation & Industrials Conference on Tuesday, May 20th, 2025 at 12:55 PM EDT.

summary: DEWALT to host live webinar on Wednesday, May 14 to introduce the software and highlight the program's groundbreaking capabilities and benefits Early adopters of MSUITE Hangers...

headline: SWK Q1 Earnings Call: Pricing and Supply Chain Mitigation Address Tariff Headwinds
summary: Manufacturing company Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE:SWK) reported Q1 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 3.2% year on year to $3.74 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.75 per share was 14.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Stanley Black & Decker raises prices to mitigate tariff impacts
summary: The company is also making supply chain moves to become more compliant with the U.S.-Mexico-Canada agreement and reduce its manufacturing footprint in China.
